coating.definition: The coating used to insulate the electrodes.

electrode_count.definition: Number of electrodes in a multi-electrode-array.

fire_polish.definition: Specifies whether or not the electrodes were fire polished.

glass_specification.definition: Inner and outer diameter, with or without filament.

glass_type.definition: The Type of Glass used to pull these electrodes. (e.g. Quartz, Borosilicate)

manufacturer.definition: The manufacturer of the electrodes if e.g. ordered from a company.

material.definition: The Material the electrodes are made of e.g. glass. tungsten, steel ...

pull_parameter.definition: The specific pull parameters like heat, trip velocity, heat and cooling duration etc..

puller.definition: The Puller used to make the electrodes.

shape_parameters.definition: The shape parameters of the electrode.
